title: SQL Injection in Login Form
evidence: Parameter 'username' vulnerable to boolean-based blind SQL injection
remediation: Implement parameterized queries and input validation

title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Search
evidence: Reflected XSS via search parameter allows arbitrary JavaScript execution
remediation: Encode user input before rendering in HTML context

title: Outdated OpenSSL Version
remediation: Update OpenSSL to version 3.0 or higher

title: Weak JWT Secret Configuration
evidence: JWT tokens signed with weak secret 'secret123'
remediation: Generate cryptographically strong secret and rotate immediately

title: Insecure Direct Object Reference
evidence: User profile endpoint allows accessing other users' data via ID manipulation

title: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
evidence: Webhook URL parameter allows internal network scanning
remediation: Implement URL whitelist and network segmentation

title: Sensitive Data Exposure in Logs
evidence: Application logs contain plaintext passwords and API keys
remediation: Sanitize log output and implement log rotation
